conv.text: Hello, I'm a government official. I'm interested in your work and would like to know more about it.

answers.option: Tell me more about what you need

conv.text: We are interested in using your Generative AI program for military applications. We would like to keep the details confidential and offer you a fair compensation for your work. What do you think?
Excellent! We are glad to hear that you are interested. We will keep the details confidential and offer you a fair compensation for your work. Thank you for your cooperation.
That's too bad. We are always looking for talented individuals like you. Please consider our offer if you change your mind.
Thank you for your time. Have a nice day!
